doc:
Catherine Demongeot https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Catherine_Demongeot 0 Catherine Demongeot (born 16 May 1950, Paris) is a French actress. Her debut role was Zazie in Zazie in the Metro (1960), followed by only a few more films. According to an interview with Vincent Malle (film producer, and brother of Louis Malle) for the UK DVD release of Zazie (2006, Optimum Releasing), Catherine Demongeot never made another film and later went on to become a teacher. Although Vladimir Nabokov originally thought that Sue Lyon was the right selection to play Lolita in Stanley Kubrick's film of the same name, years later Nabokov said that the ideal Lolita would have been Catherine Demongeot. Catherine_Demongeot ( born_16_May_1950 , Paris ) is a_French_actress . Her_debut_role was Zazie in Zazie in the_Metro_(_1960_) , followed by only_a_few_more_films .
